attributes.action: Expel/Detain All Extreme Activists Who Are A Threat to the People & Government of the United kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
This is my e-petition to bring to the governments attention what the people of the United Kingdom all want to happen, but the government are too afraid to do.
The people of our great country should not feel threatened or scared to walk, live and enjoy their daily lives from the constant threat of extreme activists.

The government needs to either detain them or remove them from the country.

Open Shrewsbury prison and set it up as the British version of Guantanamo Bay, preventing these people with no moral standards, respect or acceptance of our country, from being a danger to our society.

The government needs to act now !

We need as many people to sign this e-petition to press the government into acting on what the people of their country want. We pay their salaries, they answer to us, the people. Please sign and pass on to your friends.
